sub_topic: Finding the perimeter of a regular polygon.
message_1: What is the perimeter of a regular octagon with a side length of 10 cm?
message_2:
The perimeter of a regular octagon can be found by multiplying the side length by the number of sides. In this case, the side length is 10 cm and there are 8 sides in an octagon. 

Perimeter = side length × number of sides
Perimeter = 10 cm × 8
Perimeter = 80 cm

The perimeter of the regular octagon is 80 cm.
